title: Sona See's Something Through The Window...

{{champion:80}}: "I can't wait to be the head baker" ;'''D
Yeah... But you have to tell Morg that you're her replacement

{{champion:80}}: "Easy, I'll just wait for her in one of the decorative bushes and then get the **Jump** on her"
{{champion:86}}: "You better be ready to pay rent first"

...She's a Support...

She's studied the Art of Ward

{{champion:80}}: "I'm Pantheon, I've studied in the art of inhuman Jumps, and Sweeping lenses" (Also, if you ult into a bush as pantheon, they won't see your indicator if you don't have vision in it )

> [{quoted}](name=LeachimKcorruts,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ErPAaEkh,comment-id=00050000000000000000000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2016-07-26T18:37:01.238+0000)

This is more vital game information than I have ever gotten in Gameplay. Wow.

...

Okay... But if that lady binds you and drags you to her room...

You're gonna have a bad time

{{champion:80}}: "Don't worry, I have my back-up plan"
_Later that evening_
{{champion:80}}: _Binded_ "HASAGI!!!"
{{champion:157}}: _at the bar with Janna_ "Don't worry, I can face the wind any day"
{{champion:80}}: _Being Dragged into Morgana's "Special Chamber"_ "HASAGIIIIIII!!!!"
{{champion:157}}: _Hearing the signal_ "That is the cry of the winds, I must go!" _Dramatically dashes off_
{{champion:40}}: _Confused_ "ok..." _Continuing on her date_ " so as I was saying Ekko-"
_Yasuo finds Pantheon and Mogana. Morgana seeing a threat, fires off a dark binding, but Yasuo responds with a well timed wind wall... in the wrong Direction, leading to Pantheon's most painful memories as a dough boy. But hey, after words Morgana gave him the job as head chef._

Meanwhile...

 Mad hatter {{champion:35}} : So... What do you do for fun
{{champion:28}} : I kill people
{{champion:35}} : SAME, ISN'T IT SO WONDERFUL
{{champion:28}} : Indeed

*notices Pantheon being dragged off*

{{champion:35}} : Of course he didn't listen
{{champion:28}} : What was that
{{champion:35}} Oh nothing, nothing Important anyway... Now where were we
